alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 6:11PM CDT until July 14 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cherokee County in southeastern Kansas... Southwestern Crawford County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 610 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Girard to near Oswego to near South Coffeyville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Baxter Springs, Columbus, Galena, Cherokee, Weir, Lowell, Sherman, Scammon, Mccune, West Mineral, Treece, Roseland, Neutral, Melrose, Riverton, Lawton, Carona, Skidmore, Hallowell and Sherwin. This includes Interstate 44 near mile marker 0. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
